attributes.description: Conservative progression block focusing on the four main powerlifts (deadlift, squat, bench press, push press) with max testing in week 4 to establish new baselines. Designed for masters athlete with limited recovery capacity.
attributes.name: 4-Week Strength Testing Block

phases.description: Build work capacity with moderate volume and intensity. Focus on technical proficiency and establishing movement patterns for the testing block.
phases.name: Volume Accumulation

phases.description: Increase intensity while managing volume. Conservative progression with focus on quality reps as fatigue accumulates.
phases.name: Intensity Build

phases.description: Reduce volume significantly to dissipate fatigue. Test current maxes on all four main lifts to establish new baselines.
phases.name: Deload and Max Testing

trainingGoals: Test current max on back squat (baseline: 255x3)
Test current max on bench press (baseline: 255x3)
Test current max on push press (baseline: 165x3)
Establish new training baselines for future programming
Maintain conditioning capacity with finishers and one longer session weekly
